Title: Data (Cohort) Discovery
Description: A, perhaps automated, process for identifying suitable data for a research project or clinical trial. Might be federated to allow for multi-TRE querying (See HDR Cohort Discovery Tool). Should be in a unified service portal

Evidence.Evidence Artifact Example: Automated process for identifying suitable data for a research project or clinical trial. Might be federated to allow for multi-TRE querying (See HDR Cohort Discovery Tool). Should be in a unified service portal
Unified service portal interface exposing cohort discovery
